attributes.action: Ban The Sale Of Disposable BBQ’S
attributes.additional_details: In Dorset we have just lost 190 hectares of forest and heathland in Wareham, put 150 firefighters lives at risk, and the cause? Disposable BBQ’s.
attributes.background: To totally ban the sale of disposable BBQ’s. They are dangerous, start uncontrollable fires, are not able to be recycled, are left on beaches, woodland, countryside and are dangerous to livestock and wildlife.
